articles.title: Cyril Ramaphosa congratulates Zambia's new president Hichilema - News24
articles.description: The Presidency issued a statement on Tuesday to congratulate Zambia's new president, Hakainde Hichilema, on behalf of South Africa.
articles.content:
• President Cyril Ramaphosa has congratulated Zambia's new president, Hakainde Hichilema.
